Name: Pricia Defense
About the game: Tips: 1.F11: Toggle fullscreen. 2.If the display resolution is too low, causing the bottom of the screen to be cut off, you can adjust the game resolution in [Options]. If you cannot see [Options], please go to the game title screen, move the cursor to [New Game], press the [Down Arrow] key twice, and then press [Enter]. 3.Use the [Left/Right Arrow] keys to switch between options. One day, the North Fortress of the kingdom Eneluffe is invaded by northern sorcerers. The princess of the kingdom Eneluffe, 'Pricia', with 'trap magic' in her hands, which is only available to the royal family of Eneluffe, stands up. The objective of the game is for Princess Pricia to defend against the invasion of the northern sorcerer's kingdom by using trap magic. Gameplay with 3D parts and 2D parts Tower Defense TPS Cute 3D model
